text: Alone in the Dark is a 1982 American horror thriller movie directed by first time director Jack Sholder and starring Jack Palance, Donald Pleasence, Martin Landau, Dwight Schultz, Erland Van Lidth, Brent Jennings. It was distributed by New Line Cinema. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 horror movies Category:1982 thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Sholder Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies about psychiatry Category:Movies about home invasions
title: Alone in the Dark (1982 movie)
